snippet: Ryan Harrison, 19, will join the Americans for their quarterfinal against France starting Friday. Mardy Fish cited extreme fatigue in bowing out.
abstract: Ryan Harrison will join the United States Davis Cup team for their quarterfinal against France after Mardy Fish bows out citing extreme fatigue.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Harrison, 19, will join the Americans for their quarterfinal against France starting Friday. Mardy Fish cited extreme fatigue in bowing out.

headline.seo: U.S. Davis Cup Team Adds Harrison to Replace Fish
headline.main: U.S. Davis Cup Team Adds Harrison to Replace Fish
